General.Name: Beijing Huaru Technology Co. Ltd.
General.Description: Beijing Huaru Technology Co., Ltd. researches, develops, produces, and sales of simulation technology products in China. It engages in development of military simulation and application systems; and hardware products comprising combat deduction electronic sand table, synthetic force combat, special operations detachment actual soldier engagement, armed police unit actual troop engagement, air defense troops combat, parachute simulation training, shooting simulation training, tactical confrontation target, and smart military physical training systems. The company provides XSimStudio, an extensible simulation platform; LinkStudio, a distributed support platform; SysPrime, a system modeling software; BattleSim, a battle simulation platform; XSimModels, a simulation model library product; AIModels, an intelligent model library product; DataStudio, a big data platform; and AEStudio, an analysis evaluation platform, as well as application software products. In addition, it offers technical services, including system construction solution consultation, training, simulation computing, and technical support services. The company was founded in 2011 and is based in Beijing, China.
General.Address: Junzheng Building, Block B, Beijing, China, 100193
